links.title: Feb-12-2018 - Weekend Edition - Equity, Sectors & Earnings
links.description: The elevated volatility continued this week with all indices making further declines. We saw two months worth of gains evaporated within six trading days leaving many traders fearful of getting back in. With the markets sitting at key technical support levels, can we expect a bounce here soon?

messages.body: $TSLA Tesla hearse.. innovation or harbinger of doom? https://jalopnik.com/this-tesla-hearse-is-an-ideal-use-of-an-electric-car-1799981663

links.title: This Tesla Hearse Is An Ideal Use Of An Electric Car
links.description: If you think about it, a station wagon designed to haul dead people, slowly and with dignity, from a funeral home to a graveyard, is sort of an ideal use for a Tesla. You know, a hearse. The Tesla Model S is elegant-looking, appropriately and somberly quiet, and the short jaunts to and from local graveyards won't require any special charging infrastructure.
